snippet: Many major retailers plan to hire more workers during the lucrative holiday season, a reflection of statistics that show consumers just keep shopping despite the troubled economy.
lead_paragraph: Many major retailers plan to hire more workers during the lucrative holiday season, a reflection of statistics that show consumers just keep shopping despite the troubled economy.

headline.main: Hope Rising, Stores Hire for Holidays
headline.print_headline: Hope Rising, Stores Hire For Holidays
headline.seo: With Some Optimism, Retailers to Increase Holiday Hiring
